original_text: When the men returned, they said to Jacob, ‘We went to your brother Esau. Now he is coming to meet you and he has 400 men with him.’
korean_text: 사자들이 야곱에게 돌아와 이르되 우리가 주인의 형 에서에게 이른즉 그가 사백 명을 거느리고 주인을 만나려고 오더이다

sentences.original_text: We went to your brother Esau
Now he is coming to meet you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그는 당신을 만나러 오고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and he has 400 men with him
